WRITING.TEXT: So you are thinking what I have is not repeatable and scalable. What change would make it more viable?

WRITING.TITLE: Content creation tools
WRITING.TEXT: Are content creation tools like canva, animoto, slide.ly a good viable, repeatable and scalable business model? I am working on a tool the operates like imgur but really is more a content creation tool for making fast portfolios. mfile.io

What will happen is the red states will work very hard on ideas to ship the people who meed medicaid to other state. Just ask guliani, thats what he did with NYC homeless- he basically just shipped them upstate.
